script.name: !config.earth.torus
script.sourceplaintext:
* Cycrow (01-08-2008) * Sets up the Earth fly zone and configures the torus turrets @ = wait 10000 ms
* gun turrent placement $turret.pos = array alloc: size=0 * 0: $pos = create new array, arguments=12941, -3299, -2421, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=16591, -10327, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=15921, -17131, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=15234, -24105, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=13988, -36748, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 5: $pos = create new array, arguments=13653, -40154, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos *$pos = create new array, arguments=0, 0, 0, 0, null *append $pos to array $turret.pos *$pos = create new array, arguments=0, 0, 0, 0, null *append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=12006, -20257, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=12349, -16782, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 10: $pos = create new array, arguments=12684, -13381, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=13022, -9949, -6026, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-15268, -3658, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-10829, -15594, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-663, -23240, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 15: $pos = create new array, arguments=14320, 3239, -6026, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=14658, 6665, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=14998, 10116, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=15336, 13547, -5724, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=18564, 9710, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 20: $pos = create new array, arguments=17894, 2906, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos *$pos = create new array, arguments=0, 0, 0, 0, null *append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=19252, 16694, -3259, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-639, -23199, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-10845, -15589, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 25: $pos = create new array, arguments=-15274, -3656, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-14839, 2557, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-8186, 13391, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=3502, 18943, -3415, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=-14838, 2554, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos * 30: $pos = create new array, arguments=-8170, 13392, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=3310, 18891, -6533, 32768, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=20475, 29326, -3260, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos $pos = create new array, arguments=20812, 32750, -3260, 0, null append $pos to array $turret.pos
* find the earth sector $earth = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=3 skip if $earth -> exists return null
* find the torus $torus = find station: sector=$earth class or type=Earth Torus race=Terran flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null
* no torus in sector ? skip if $torus -> exists return null
* only run this script the first time, not every MSCI reset do if get global variable: name='torus.setup' return null set global variable: name='torus.setup' value=[TRUE]
$torus.x = $torus -> get x position $torus.y = $torus -> get y position $torus.z = $torus -> get z position
* setup no fly zone $flyZone = array alloc: size=3 * minimum fly zone $pos = create new array, arguments=-41000, -6500, -30000, null, null $flyZone[0] = $pos * maximum fly zone $pos = create new array, arguments=29000, 1400, 20000, null, null $flyZone[1] = $pos * maximum allowed deviation $flyZone[2] = 5000
* setup no fly zone nav beacons (removed - they are now part of the model) *$beacons = find ship: sector=$earth class or type=Navigational Beacon race=Terran flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=100 refpos=null *if $beacons *$count = size of array $beacons *while $count *dec $count = *= wait 50 ms *$nav = $beacons[$count] *$x = $nav -> get x position *$y = $nav -> get y position *$z = $nav -> get z position *$pos = create new array, arguments=$nav, $x, $y, $z, null *$beacons[$count] = $pos *end *else $beacons = array alloc: size=0 *end
* start torus protect script $count = size of array $turret.pos while $count @ = wait 100 ms dec $count = $pos = $turret.pos[$count] $pos.x = $pos[0] $pos.y = $pos[2] $pos.z = $pos[1]
$x = $torus.x + $pos.x $y = $torus.y + $pos.y $z = $torus.z + $pos.z
* torus rotation values $rot.alpha = $torus -> get rot alpha $rot.alpha = $rot.alpha + 32768 $rot.beta = 0 $rot.gamma = $pos[3]
gosub createTurret
$pos[0] = $x $pos[2] = $y $pos[1] = $z insert $t into array $pos at index 0 $turret.pos[$count] = $pos end
$torus ->start task 19 with script !fight.defend.earth and prio 99: arg1=$turret.pos arg2=$beacons arg3=$flyZone arg4=null arg5=null return null
createTurret: $t = create ship: type=Lasertower owner=Terran addto=$earth x=$x y=$y z=$z $t ->set invincible: enabled=[TRUE] $t ->set homebase to $torus $t.pos = create new array, arguments=$x, $y, $z, null, null $t.rot = create new array, arguments=$rot.alpha, $rot.beta, $rot.gamma, null, null @ START $t -> call script !fight.torus.turret : null=null pos=$t.pos rot=$t.rot endsub return null

comment.var: Sets up the Earth fly zone and configures the torus turrets

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=

comment.var: only run this script the first time, not every MSCI reset
setup no fly zone nav beacons (removed - they are now part of the model)

line.comment: *$beacons = find ship: sector=$earth class or type=Navigational Beacon race=Terran flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=100 refpos=null

sval.val: Sets up the Earth fly zone and configures the torus turrets
only run this script the first time, not every MSCI reset
setup no fly zone nav beacons (removed - they are now part of the model)
